was raining outside so recess was in the gym.
The game was kind of like Dodge Ball except you could change sides at any time and we
called the game Bashball.
It was a pretty fun game.
So the way you'd play Bashball is first we would pick teams and then we would put
a bunch of balls on the half court line down the middle of the gym and then the two teams
would go to the walls on opposite sides of the gym with the balls right there in the
middle and then when everyone was on the walls and we were all set someone would yell
go.

Ball.
The goal was to throw the ball at someone on the other side and just like Dodge Ball
if you hit them and they didn't catch it they were out and if they caught the ball that
you threw at them you were out.

bit different when it made sense when you thought it made sense you could actually just

there would only be two people left one on one side and one side one on the other side
